channel.title: Comments on: Raspberry Pi powered heating controller (Part 2)

item.title: By: Nahuel
item.dc:creator: Nahuel
item.description: Contact form seems to ahve swallowed a cog, but we've just statred a project using Raspberry Pis with 16-17 Traineeship learners are, as the Powers That Be put it Vocationally Unfocussed! Would be really motivational from them, starting from complete beginnings to see a working end project.

Would be really motivational from them, starting from complete beginnings to see a working end project.
